SELECT T.RNUM as num ,T.ticket_code as ticket_code ,T.kortitle as kortitle ,to_char(T.ticket_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD') as ticket_dt ,T.room_nm as room_nm FROM( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, A.* FROM( SELECT c.ticket_code, d.kortitle, c.ticket_dt, e.room_nm FROM ticket_history c JOIN movie d on c.movie_id =d.movie_id join room e on e.room_id = c.room_id where c.user_id=#{user_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
)A WHERE CEIL(ROWNUM/ #{pageSize, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) = #{pageNum, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )T
